channel.title: Bag Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bag Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: CRKD’s $99 Peak Design clone is great for handhelds
item.description: Embracer Group-owned CRKD recently launched a backpack, the $99.99 Vortex 1.0. During a recent vacation, I swapped it in place of my go-to for the past eight or so years, the 20-liter Peak Design Ever
